data.message: I love how so many people are still butthurt. Exactly what Em does best, piss of the haters. So now where can I get one of these jackets and how much of my bank account do I have to empty? Lol

replies.message: They haven’t released them yet but also I am irritated by other people’s irritation because any other musician can say what they want but as soon as em brings the oompa lumpa into his freestyle it’s the end of the world and everyone hates him
Call it what ever you want, but I don't want to listen to a whiny liberal bitch. Pretty simple

Kyle Gibbons *anti-racism people's champion.

I hate liberals as much as the next guy, disliking Trump has nothing to do with being a liberal, and everything to do with being an intelligent humanitarian.

If you don't like him get off of his page, and get out of my thread, he doesn't need your support

He didn't piss off the haters jackass....he pissed off his fans. 
Typical piece of shit liberal

Michael Hamilton he pissed off people who liked his music. There's a difference. We the fans support him and not a single one of us are angry. Because we're intelligent human being who can easily see that Trump is the worst President in American history. People keep using this liberal excuse, why not just tell the truth and admit you're a racist piece of shit? That's what Eminem called the Dotard on. Racism. So getting angry at him for that just shows that you're a blatant racist. Typical bigoted Cheeto lover
You can find the clothes in a dumpster
